1: Oh hi there! You don't happen to come from the south do you?
I saw the storm that ravaged those parts with my own eye, and let me tell you, I wasn't expecting any visitors from down under!
You naturally seem a bit lost... Not to worry though, make yourself at home.
Life around here goes by pretty slow, one can't afford to diddle-daddle in this wasteland afterall.
You can always comeback and have a chat if you'd like, as well as barter with the townsfolks and see if you can grab yourself a deal.
Don't just go around being a leech though! If you decide to hang around these parts, its only natural for you to help gather some resources.
The power plant nearby recently broke down, and our stored energy won't last much longer...
In case you decide to brave the wilderness, you are bound to find other folks trying to hang on as best as they can I'm sure.
Don't be a stranger, pay them a visit and say hi. Specially if night starts to fall!
Nights can get breezy around here, so most settlements will probably shelter you around nightfall.
In any case, don't you go out there dying on me, ya hear!
END
2: Are you managing to handle yourself out here?
Food doesn't come around very often, but it's important to keep yourself somewhat sharp.
In case you get yourself injured, be sure to be well fed and try not to move too much.
Overall though, if you protect others, others will protect you, even if some of the folk out there happen to be quite excentrique!
You never know when someone will pay a pretty penny for some odd job...
And remember, if you are wandering about, don't forget to pay us a visit!
